languages.text: Контейнер доверху набит высушенными и отполированными человеческими костями. На ржавой пластали можно различить поблекший символ Экклезиархии.
The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.
languages.original_text: Контейнер доверху набит высушенными и отполированными человеческими костями. На ржавой пластали можно различить поблекший символ Экклезиархии.

traits.locale_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.
The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

languages.text: El contenedor está lleno hasta los topes de huesos humanos secados y pulidos. Apenas distingues el símbolo de la Eclesiarquía en su plastiacero oxidado.
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: El contenedor está lleno hasta los topes de huesos humanos secados y pulidos. Apenas distingues el símbolo de la Eclesiarquía en su plastiacero oxidado.

languages.text: 这个集装箱里装满了干燥、光滑的人骨，塑钢板上的国教标志早已锈迹斑斑，几乎无法辨识。
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: 这个集装箱里装满了干燥、光滑的人骨，塑钢板上的国教标志早已锈迹斑斑，几乎无法辨识。

languages.text: コンテナは、乾燥した磨かれた人骨であふれている。錆び付いたプラスティールに帝国聖教会のシンボルを辛うじて見ることができる。
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: コンテナは、乾燥した磨かれた人骨であふれている。錆び付いたプラスティールに帝国聖教会のシンボルを辛うじて見ることができる。

languages.text: Der Container ist mit getrockneten und polierten menschlichen Knochen gefüllt. Du erkennst auf dem rostigen Plaststahl mit Mühe das Symbol der Ekklesiarchie.
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: Der Container ist mit getrockneten und polierten menschlichen Knochen gefüllt. Du erkennst auf dem rostigen Plaststahl mit Mühe das Symbol der Ekklesiarchie.

languages.text: Le conteneur est rempli à ras bord d'ossements humains séchés et polis. Vous distinguez à peine le symbole de l'Ecclésiarchie apposé sur le plastacier rouillé.
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: Le conteneur est rempli à ras bord d'ossements humains séchés et polis. Vous distinguez à peine le symbole de l'Ecclésiarchie apposé sur le plastacier rouillé.

languages.text: Ağzına kadar kurutulmuş, parlatılmış insan kemikleriyle dolu bir konteyner. Paslanmış plasçelik üzerindeki Ekleşiarşi sembolü, zar zor seçiliyor.
languages.original_text: The container is filled to the brim with dried, polished human bones. You can barely make out the Ecclesiarchy symbol on the rusted plasteel.

traits.locale_text: Ağzına kadar kurutulmuş, parlatılmış insan kemikleriyle dolu bir konteyner. Paslanmış plasçelik üzerindeki Ekleşiarşi sembolü, zar zor seçiliyor.
